record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S.J. RES. 14

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S.J. Res. 14, introduced earlier today, is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the joint resolution by title for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading, and I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the joint resolution will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
